Title: Karen
Genre: Action, Crime, Drama, Fantasy, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Writer: Tonya Kong (story editor), Sarah Streicher (staff writer)
Actors: Charlie Cox, Deborah Ann Woll, Jay Ali, Wilson Bethel
Plot: Hunted by Fisk and haunted by mistakes from her past, Karen seeks refuge at the church. Matt finally gets his shot, and Dex goes in for the kill.
